item.title: How to Install Samba Server on Linux Mint 20.2
item.description: Video Links Steps 1. Update your System 2. Install Samba Server 3. Create a Share 4. Testing the Server 5. Finish Video Hi all, in this video i will show how to install Samba Server on Linux Mint 20.2. I hope you enjoy! Links Linux Mint Steps #1. Update your System $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt upgrade #2. Install Samba Server $ sudo aptt install samba $ sudo systemctl enable --now smbd $ sudo systemctl status smbd $ sudo ufw allow samba $ sudo usermod -aG sambashare $USER $ groups $USER $ sudo smbpasswd -a $USER #3.
